helpText.Health threat drop: The disarmed Health threat, to which increase of Disposable Money is most conducive
helpText.Citizen trust: The faith citizens in an area have in its governor, to which increase of External Safety is most conducive
helpText.External safety: The safety guaranteed of the personnel and material inflow, to which Disposable Money is most conducive
helpText.Disposable Money: The financial aid the government can offer to the medical institute, to which Citizen trust is most conducive
helpText.Doctor: The initial maximum capacity of material support area 1 can offer to others
helpText.Police: The initial maximum capacity of material support area 2 can offer to others
helpText.Medicine: The initial maximum capacity of material support area 3 can offer to others
helpText.Volunteer: The initial maximum capacity of material support area 4 can offer to others
helpText.Gotham: The capital located in the central area, with and third material to control points transformation efficiency
helpText.BomBay: The satellite town of the capital, with third init CR and second material to control points transformation efficiency
helpText.GassVille: southeast coastal metropolis, with highest init CR but lowest material to control points transformation efficiency
helpText.Burnley: Northwest deserted area, with lowest init CR but highest material to control points transformation efficiency
helpText.rule: The game ends when you make any of the CP decrease to 0.

story: Gotham is located in the downtown area of the city, just like the capital of a country, highly developed and helpful. Bombay is Gotham's "Satellite district", geographically and interactively, thus the CR exchanging between those two district is particularly efficient!

GassVille is located in the most developed Southeast coastal area, boasting highest initial CP but has underwent a long period of misgovernment and its improper import & Export policies. Finally, Burnley is in the most deserted and least developed Northwest corner in contrast to the diligence of its citizens hence the premium exports.

Remember: transferred CR both increase and DECREASE the CP in each area at a certain high or low ratio. The occurrence conditions of this risk is left to you to discover, and whether to play it safe to take the risk, it's all up to you! Try to survive as long as possible, baby let the game begin!
